text: @washingtonpost This mind-boggling. Even the stupidest public official. Should realize BY NOW, that mask are essential to stopping the #coronavirus. @GovKemp's ass-kissing, heartless, political cravenness, will kill #Georgia. He doesn't care that you die or destroy your well-being. @BrianKempGA
